articles.author: Jay Harris
articles.title: Ivan Toney handed eight-month ban by FA over betting offences - The Athletic
articles.description:
Brentford and England striker Ivan Toney has been banned from football for eight months over 232 betting breaches.
The 27-year-old will not be able to play for his club or country until his suspension comes to an end on January 16, 2024.
Toney is also not all…
